name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Trends Pocket - Analyze Google Trends in real-time

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Explore trending topics and analyze Google Trends data in real-time. Track, visualize, and understand search patterns instantly.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tool for exploring and understanding current trends. Trends Pocket offers you a clear and detailed view of topics capturing attention worldwide, directly from your browser.


What you can do with Trends Pocket:

✨ In-depth Trend Analysis
- Visualize search patterns over time
- Explore geographic distribution of trends
- Discover related topics and queries
- Access detailed interactive graphs

🔍 Enhance Your Google Searches
- Get instant trend data while searching
- Customize analysis period and geographic area
- Track topics that matter to you

📊 Organize Your Monitoring
- Save your favorite trends
- Access your search history
- Customize settings to your needs

📰 Add Context with News
- Check the latest news related to trends
- Understand what drives interest peaks
- Stay informed about emerging topics


Quick and easy setup:
- Add extension to Chrome
- Click the icon
- Start exploring trends


Send us feedbacks!

————————————————————————

Trends Pocket respects your privacy and collects no personal data.
Note: This extension is an independent tool not affiliated with Google.
